attributes.action: Keep the tarmac motorsport course at Curborough, Lichfield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent government incentives to promote motorsport and all it's aspects of community and youth participation in positive events would well be served by increasing the facilities and uses of the Curborough facility. 
The venue is due to be a prime test facility for electric powered and green fuel vehicles.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep the tarmac motorsport course at Curborough, Lichfield."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20561


Prime Minister's Office
